title: Pistachio and white chocolate churros
description: Blanching and peeling the pistachios makes the filling of these ultra-rich churros a vivid green. These churros are great plain or with any and all of the accompaniments.For this recipe you will need a cook’s thermometer, two piping bags and one large open star nozzle and one small plain nozzle, and a food processor.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz vanilla sugar, for coating the churros
